amendment.description: To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to implement a pilot program authorized by the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to study the elimination of the reduced-price category for school lunches.

vote.text: Amendment SA 640 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 640 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3700-3701) To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to implement a pilot program authorized by the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to study the elimination of the reduced-price category for school lunches.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 640 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 640 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole.
